title: Jeremy Lin Finally Loves ‘Linsanity’ Just as Much as You Do
description: A star turn with the Knicks in 2012 made Lin a cultural icon. But the focus on his race — Lin is Taiwanese American — made him uncomfortable for years.
dc:creator: Sopan Deb
media:description: Jeremy Lin led the Knicks on a seven-game winning streak in February 2012, part of an exciting run known as Linsanity and chronicled in a new HBO documentary called “38 at the Garden.”
